ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (A command will be issued): “Seize him and shackle him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The angels will be told, "Seize and chain them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It will be said, “Seize him, and shackle him.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (It will be said): "Seize him and fetter him;"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Lay hold on him, then put a chain on him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (It will be said): Take him and fetter him
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Lay hold of him and chain him;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [The angels will be told:] ‘Seize him, and fetter him!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (The stern command will say): "Seize ye him, and bind ye him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (It will be said): "Seize him and fetter him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (It will be said): 'Take him and bind him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Allah will say], "Seize him and shackle him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:30] ‘Seize him — addressing the keepers of Hell — then fetter him, bind his hands to his necks in fetters,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah will then say to the angels: (Take him and fetter him
